content:
I'm happy to help! However, I need to clarify that Barnes & Noble's membership program doesn't have a points system. Instead, it offers a flat 10% discount on most purchases, along with other benefits like 40% off hardcover bestsellers, free express shipping, and exclusive promotions.

When you become a member, you'll receive a membership card, which you can use to get your discounts and benefits. You don't need to accumulate points or track rewards; the discounts are applied automatically at checkout.

So, to summarize, there's no points system to worry about. You'll simply enjoy the benefits and discounts as a member, without having to keep track of points or rewards.

If you have any more questions or concerns about the Barnes & Noble membership program, feel free to ask!
